question.title: Move built Android bundles to folder in AGP 8
question.body:
Right now Android Studio builds the bundles for my application flavours into separate folders, as in:

app/flavorname/release/xxx.aab

I would like to move the output bundles to a new folder. Either using some Gradle magic, or creating a trigger once the bundle is built that invokes a shell script that does the rest.

How can I create the hook in my gradle script?

I am using Java and Android Gradle Plugin 8.12.3. Other threads, such as this or this there are solutions using kotlin, or deprecated APIs which no longer work.
